name: @idio/goa
description: The Koa Fork Compiler With Google Closure Compiler.

scripts.depack: GOOGLE_CLOSURE_COMPILER=/Volumes/backup/closure-compiler/target/closure-compiler-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar depack-dev koa -o depack -c -a -p --externs types/externs/application.js --externs types/externs/context.js --externs types/externs/request.js --externs types/externs/response.js --externs externs.js
scripts.depack-lib: GOOGLE_CLOSURE_COMPILER=/Volumes/backup/closure-compiler/target/closure-compiler-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar depack-dev src/depack -o depack -l -a -p --externs types/externs/application.js --externs types/externs/context.js --externs types/externs/request.js --externs types/externs/response.js --externs externs.js

author: Anton <anton@adc.sh>
